title: Mock API Response
description: Returns example responses from the OpenAPI document associated with this route.

export.description: The name of the exported type

random.description: Optional. Indicates whether the response should be selected randomly, from the available examples (that match any filter criteria). If `false` the first matching example is used.

responsePrefixFilter.description: Optional. Specifies a prefix to match the responses to select from. Typically this is a status code like "200" or "2XX". If you want the policy to select randomly from all 2XX codes, set this property to "2" and random to `true`.

contentType.description: Optional. Specify the content-type of the response to select from. If not specified, the first matching response is used (or random).

exampleName.description: Optional. Specify the name of the example to select. If not specified, the first matching response is used (or random).
